lead_paragraph: All the consternation over whether golf's addition to the Summer Games makes sense raises the question of whether tennis — another individual, professional sport with four annual Grand Slam tournaments and millions of dollars in prize money — belongs, too.

headline.print_headline: Debates Over Role Linger Decades Into Tennis' Olympic Return
headline.main: Debates Over Role Linger Decades Into Tennis' Olympic Return
